Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells are high-efficiency renewable energy devices and considered one of the most promising net -zero carbon energy technologies.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Numerical modelling is a powerful tool for the virtual design and optimisation of the next-generation solid oxide fuel cells but needs to tackle issues for incorporating the multi-scale character of the cell and further improving the accuracy and computational efficiency.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: While most of solid oxide fuel cell models were developed based on closed source platforms which limit the freedom of customisation in numerical discretization schemes and community participation.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, an open source multi-physics and multiscale platform for advanced SOFC simulations consisting of both cell-and pore-scale performance models was developed using OpenFOAM.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The modelling aspects are elucidated in detail, involving the coupling of various physical equations and the implementation of the pore-scale electrode in the performance model.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The entire platform was carefully validated against experimental data and the other numerical models which were implemented in commercial software ANSYS Fluent and based on the lattice Boltzmann method.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell-scale model is subsequently employed to study the effects of different fuels, i.e., pure hydrogen and different ratios of pre-reformed methane gas under various operating temperatures.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the cell-scale model reasonably predicts the effects of these parameters on the cell performance, aligning well with the Fluent model.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study further identified the size of representative element volume with respect to the current density for the anode via the pore-scale model where the realistic microstructures reconstructed by a Xe plasma focused ion beam-scanning electron micro-scopy are employed as computational domains.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that a volume element size of 1243 voxels is sufficient to yield the representative current density of the whole.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All these numerical investigations show that OpenFOAM is a potential multi-physics and multi-scale computational platform that is capable of accurately predicting both cell-scale and pore-scale performance and spatial information of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The developed models are also made public in GitHub to inspire community to further develop around it.
Titulo: An open source framework for advanced Multi-physics and multiscale modelling of solid oxide fuel cells
